reviewText:
Well, where do I start.

If you like wildlife park as I did when I was young along with zoo tycoon and many other games of its kind you know what your getting into. It runs well on modern OS. I have had little to no frame loss or crashing.

I am enjoying it but I played it when I was young. If you buy it please note that it has oldschool UI jank.
It does hold up and run well however.

heres a screen shot of the options menu http://imgur.com/iNUBw4I
I recomend it if you played it back in the day. Its still way better then Wildlife park 2.
voteText: 33 of 36 people (92%) found this review helpful 6 people found this review funny

reviewText: The game itself is ok, obviously a bit dated, but still fun. The problem is there are serious graphical glitches that render the game unplayable in any mode other than windowed at the lowest resolution. It's difficult to see things and read the text at that size, and it's annoying that I can't play fullscreen.
voteText: 29 of 43 people (67%) found this review helpful 5 people found this review funny

reviewText: I own the game on CD since it has been released in 2003, and even in the next years I couldn't wait to run home after school to play it in my free time. I was happy to see that it came out to Steam as my laptop has no CD driver I couldn't play the game anymore, and even better, it has achievements. The only problem is that the Steam version has graphical glitches (the cursor keeps vibrating for me, and the resolution settings is also weird), I hope that this will be fixed. I recommend the game for anyone who enjoys zoo simulators and is not being afraid to try something retro"
date: I still think that Wildlife Park (and NOT Wildlife Park 2 or 3 or any of the Zoo Tycoon games) is the best in its genre."

reviewText:
I love the game. Even though the graphics could have been better, but hey.. it's an old game now.

There's a few things I'm missing, like the ability to move a building if you screwed up, but it's minor issues like that.

I have wildlife park and wildlife park two. I bought them at the same time. The reason is, that WLP2 doesn't have trading cards or steam achievements.
